items.name: Khana Khane ki Dua
items.subtitle: dua1
items.details: Bismillahir Rahmanir Rahim(بسم الله الرحمان الرحيم)
items.tarjumah: Allah Ke Nam Se Suru jo bahot meherban rahmat wala
